about.hero_grants: We provide grants and discounts to make education accessible to everyone.
about.hero_note: Built by Nazarbayev University students, Uyren.AI delivers future-ready education.
about.hero_subtitle: An AI-powered platform with a built-in tutor, hands-on practice, and automated learning. Designed for individuals and organizations, Uyren.AI makes education personalized, efficient, and effective.
about.history_subtitle: From university students to AI education pioneers
about.mission_desc: To make education practical, accessible, and powered by AI. We turn passive learning into active skills through instant feedback, code execution, visualization, and adaptive pathways — so every learner can succeed.
about.timeline_future_desc: Growing our team, expanding features, and building the leading AI education platform in Central Asia.
about.timeline_nuris_desc: Accepted into the NURIS incubation program by NU Impact Foundation, marking our first major milestone in startup development.
about.timeline_partnerships_desc: Signed partnerships with schools in Astana to pilot our AI-powered educational platform and validate our approach.
about.timeline_scaling_desc: Scaling across Kazakhstan and expanding to global markets with our proven AI education platform.
about.timeline_team_formation_desc: A group of Nazarbayev University students decided to create a startup to transform education with AI technology.
about.vision_desc: To become the leading AI-driven education platform in Kazakhstan and beyond, combining technology, innovation, and accessibility to transform how the world learns.

courses.header_desc: Master cutting-edge technologies with our comprehensive course catalog designed for the future of learning
courses.no_courses_desc: Try adjusting your search terms or filters to find more courses.

grants.audience_highschool_desc: Students completing secondary education and aiming for higher studies.
grants.audience_motivated_desc: Working professionals and adults seeking to acquire new skills or change careers.
grants.audience_university_desc: Students already enrolled in undergraduate or graduate programs.
grants.criteria_merit_item_1: Entry test score and academic performance
grants.cta_ready_desc: Take the first step — we'll support your journey.
grants.faq_data_answer: All personal information is kept confidential and used solely for the evaluation process.
grants.faq_duration_answer: Grants typically cover the full duration of your studies, depending on the type of support.
grants.faq_duration_question: How long does the grant last?
grants.faq_eligible_answer: Students of all backgrounds who demonstrate academic potential and commitment can apply.
grants.faq_reapply_answer: Yes, unsuccessful applicants may reapply in the next application cycle.
grants.faq_reapply_question: Can I reapply if I'm not selected?
grants.faq_test_answer: Yes, all applicants must complete an entry assessment as part of the selection process.
grants.faq_test_question: Do I need to take a test?

form.description: Fill out this form to apply for financial aid. All fields marked with * are required.
form.field_consent: I confirm that the information provided is accurate and agree to the privacy policy. I understand that false information may result in application rejection.
form.field_motivation: Tell us why you want to learn and how this grant would help you
form.field_motivation_placeholder: Describe your motivation, goals, and why you need financial assistance...
form.success_description: Thank you for applying. We'll review your application and get back to you within 7-10 business days.
form.title: Grant Application

validation.aidType_required: Please select the type of aid you are requesting
validation.consent_required: You must agree to the terms and conditions
validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.motivation_min: Motivation statement must be at least 100 characters

grants.grant_100_desc: Covers all tuition fees and additional support for eligible students.
grants.grant_50_desc: Covers half of the tuition fees for deserving candidates.
grants.hero_desc: We provide financial support and guidance to help talented students achieve their dreams.
grants.section_faq_desc: Everything you need to know about our grant program
grants.section_how_it_works_desc: Simple, transparent process from application to acceptance
grants.section_selection_criteria_desc: We evaluate applications based on merit and need
grants.section_testimonials_desc: Real stories from learners who received grants and transformed their futures
grants.section_what_we_offer_desc: Choose the grant that fits your journey and goals.
grants.section_who_can_apply_desc: Students from various backgrounds who demonstrate potential and commitment.
grants.step_apply_desc: Complete the application form with all necessary documents.
grants.step_decision_desc: Selected candidates are notified and offered their grants.
grants.step_maintain_desc: Recipients receive continuous guidance and support throughout their studies.
grants.step_review_desc: Our team evaluates applications based on merit and need.
grants.step_test_desc: Participate in entry tests to demonstrate your skills and knowledge.
grants.testimonial_aigerim_content: This program gave me confidence and resources to excel academically.
grants.testimonial_aruzhan_content: The grant changed my life, allowing me to focus on my studies without financial stress.
grants.testimonial_nursultan_content: Thanks to the support, I could pursue my research dreams and gain invaluable experience.

home.courses_title: <primary-label>LMS3 IO</primary-label> online lessons for every goal
home.courses_subtitle: Find coding, design, and tech courses from one school and learn at your own pace.
home.cta_subtitle: Pick your course, meet live mentors, and learn together from anywhere.
home.cta_title: Ready to study with LMS3 IO?
home.feature_feedback_desc: Message instructors during lessons and get feedback tailored to your progress.
home.feature_growth_desc: Follow guided paths that move from foundations into applied projects.
home.feature_practice_desc: Complete lesson follow-ups, quizzes, and mini projects to lock in new skills.
home.feature_systematic_desc: Every course includes live calls, recordings, and schedules so you stay on track.
home.features_subtitle: Online lessons, community support, and flexible pacing for modern learners.
home.hero_subtitle: Learn coding, design, and digital skills with live and recorded lessons built for real people.
home.testimonials_1_quote: LMS3 IO made online lessons feel personal. I joined the web course and launched a portfolio in weeks.
home.testimonials_2_quote: The variety of tracks let me switch from basics to design without leaving the school.
home.testimonials_3_quote: As a working parent, I loved catching up with recordings and still getting mentor feedback.
home.testimonials_4_quote: Community study rooms kept me accountable. I finally finished a data course!
home.testimonials_5_quote: I explored several courses before choosing the right path. LMS3 IO gave me that freedom.
home.testimonials_subtitle: Learners share why LMS3 IO works for them

footer.about: LMS3 IO is an online school for beginner coders with guided lessons, projects, and mentor support.
